cast.name: 斯蒂芬·莫里斯 Stephen Morris

this_title: Joy Division: Here Are the Young Men
introduction: Live footage in poor quality from four gigs at- Plan K (Brussels), 16 October 1979,- Manchester, Apollo Theatre, 27 and 28 October 1979,- Eindhoven, Effenaar, 18 January 1980.Released on 18 August 1982. Reissued in November 1989.1. Decades 2. Dead Souls 3. Love Will Tear Us Apart 4. Shadowplay 5. Day Of The Lords 6. Digital 7. Colony 8. New Dawn Fades 9. Autosuggestion 10. Transmission 11. Sound Of Music 12. She’s Lost Control 13. Walked In Line 14. I Remember Nothing 15. Love Will Tear Us Apart
foreign_title: Joy Division: Here Are the Young Men
